author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM KRISTY FORMS WELL SOUTH OF MEXICO...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM KRISTY FORMS WELL SOUTH OF MEXICO...
 As of 3:00 PM CST Mon Oct 21
 the center of Kristy was located near 13.5, -102.0
 with movement W at 17 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
